Subject: Sensitive data -  action module
Description:
Hello
Is it possible to apply tags to files found by a sensitive data scan without changing the file's date and timestamp and preserving last access date and timestamp and only files in a certain folder?
Solution_Comment__c:
Noted I do not believe so as the Tag would be a modification to the File system object. 

Devâ€™s reply: Correct access and modification times will change.
This is by design, because modifying the contents of a file while preserving its timestamps may break certain applications and cause data corruption.
